EUR-Lex - CELEX:C_2025_05391 - EN - EUR-Lex

===============

![Image 1](https://webtools.europa.eu/images/flags/eu.svg)An official website of the European Union An official EU website How do you know? 

All official European Union website addresses are in the **europa.eu** domain.

[See all EU institutions and bodies](https://european-union.europa.eu/institutions-law-budget/institutions-and-bodies/search-all-eu-institutions-and-bodies_en)

This site uses cookies. Visit our [cookies policy page](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/content/legal-notice/legal-notice.html?locale=en#5.%20Cookies%20notice) or click the link in any footer for more information and to change your preferences.

 Access to European Union law 

[<a href="https://eur-lex.europa.eu/content/help/eurlex-content/experimental-features.html" target="_blank">More about the experimental features corner</a>](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:C_2025_05391#)Experimental features- [x]  

×

##### Choose the experimental features you want to try

* * *

Do you want to help improving EUR-Lex ? This is a list of experimental features that you can enable. These features are still under development; they are not fully tested, and might reduce EUR-Lex stability. Don't forget to give your feedback!

 Warning! Experimental feature conflicts detected. 

*       *   - [x]  Replacement of CELEX identifiers by short titles - experimental feature. It replaces clickable CELEX identifiers of treaties and case-law by short titles.  
    *   - [x]  Visualisation of document relationships. It displays a dynamic graph with relations between the act and related documents. It is currently only available for legal acts.  

*       *   - [x]  Deep linking. It enables links to other legal acts referred to within the documents. It is currently only available for documents smaller than 900 KB.  

 Apply 

[](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/experimental-features.html?action=confirmFeedback)

![Image 3](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/images/eu-logo/logo-eu-en-01.jpg)

 EUR-Lex 

 Access to European Union law 

This document is an excerpt from the EUR-Lex website

3.   EUR-Lex - CELEX:C_2025_05391 - EN 

*   [Help](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/content/help.html)
*    Print 
*   [Share](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:C_2025_05391#share) 

Menu

EU law

*   [Treaties](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:C_2025_05391# "Treaties")
    *   [Treaties currently in force](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/treaties/treaties-force.html "Treaties currently in force")
    *   [Founding Treaties](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/treaties/treaties-founding.html "Founding Treaties")
    *   [Accession Treaties](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/treaties/treaties-accession.html "Accession Treaties")
    *   [Other treaties and protocols](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/treaties/treaties-other.html "Other treaties and protocols")
    *   [Chronological overview](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/treaties/treaties-overview.html "Chronological overview")

*   [Legal acts](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/legal-acts/recent.html "Legal acts")
*   [Consolidated texts](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/consleg.html "Consolidated texts")
*   [International agreements](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/inter-agree.html "International agreements")
*   [Preparatory documents](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/pre-acts.html "Preparatory documents")
*   [EFTA documents](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/efta.html "EFTA (European Free Trade Association) documents")
*   [Lawmaking procedures](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/legislative-procedures.html "Lawmaking procedures and EU Law Tracker")
*   [Summaries of EU legislation](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/summaries.html "Summaries of EU legislation")
*   [Browse by EU institutions](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:C_2025_05391# "Browse by EU institutions")
    *   [European Parliament](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/eu-parliament.html "European Parliament")
    *   [European Council](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/eu-council.html "European Council")
    *   [Council of the European Union](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/council.html "Council of the European Union")
    *   [European Commission](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/eu-commission.html "European Commission")
    *   [Court of Justice of the European Union](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/justice.html "Court of Justice of the European Union")
    *   [European Central Bank](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/bank.html "European Central Bank")
    *   [European Court of Auditors](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/auditors.html "European Court of Auditors")
    *   [European Economic and Social Committee](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/eco-social.html "European Economic and Social Committee")
    *   [European Committee of the Regions](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/institutions/regions.html "European Committee of the Regions")

*   [Browse by EuroVoc](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/eurovoc.html "Browse by EuroVoc (EU's multilingual and multidisciplinary thesaurus)")

EU case-law

*   [Case-law](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/eu-case-law.html "Case-law")
*   [Reports of cases](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/eu-law/eu-case-law/reports.html "Reports of cases")
*   [Directory of case-law](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/browse/directories/new-case-law.html "Directory of case-law")

Official Journal

*   [Access to the Official Journal](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/oj/direct-access.html "Access to the Official Journal")
*   [Official Journal L series daily view](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/oj/daily-view/L-series/default.html "Official Journal L series daily view")
*   [Official Journal C series daily view](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/oj/daily-view/C-series/default.html "Official Journal C series daily view")
*   [Browse the Official Journal](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/oj/browse-oj.html "Browse the Official Journal")
*   [Legally binding printed editions](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/oj/all/auth-direct-access.html "Legally binding printed editions")
*   [Special edition](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eu-enlargement/special.html "Special edition")

National law and case-law

*   [National transposition](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/n-law/mne.html "National transposition")
*   [National case-law](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/n-law/n-case-law.html "National case-law")
*   [JURE case-law](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/collection/n-law/jure.html "JURE (Jurisdiction, recognition and enforcement of judgments in civil and commercial matters) case-law")

*   [Statistics](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/statistics/statistics.html "Statistics")
*   [ELI register](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX:C_2025_05391# "ELI (European Legislation Identifier) register")
    *   [What is ELI](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/what_is_eli.html "What is ELI")
    *   [ELI background](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/background.html "ELI background")
    *   [Why implement ELI](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/benefits.html "Why implement ELI")
    *   [Countries implementing ELI](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/implementing_countries.html "Countries implementing ELI")
    *   [Testimonials](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/testimonials.html "Testimonials")
    *   [Implementing ELI](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/implementing_eli.html "Implementing ELI")
    *   [Glossary](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli-register/glossary.html "Glossary")

*   [EU budget online](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/budget/www/index-en.htm "EU budget online")


 Use quotation marks to search for an "exact phrase". Append an asterisk (*) to a search term to find variations of it (transp*, 32019R*). Use a question mark (?) instead of a single character in your search term to find variations of it (ca?e finds case, cane, care).
